definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
